name: Ranch-Style Thighs and Breasts
author: Bea Jaye Herman
summary: My family prefers oven-fried chicken to the deep-fried variety. Creamy ranch dressing makes this wonderfully crunchy chicken tender and juicy.
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Combine bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, yellow cornmeal, and Italian seasoning in a shallow dish
Pour ranch dressing in a separate shallow bowl
Dip chicken thighs and chicken breasts in ranch dressing to coat; press into the bread crumb mixture to coat both sides
Arrange chicken pieces in the prepared baking dish
Cook chicken until no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 45 to 50 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
